context: Will this headset's game and chat audio work with both next gen consoles? (Xbox One and PS4)
response: Hello David, Yes this headset works on PS4 And Xbox one Also the sound is Very Very Good.... Very good I headset I recommend it!!

context: Will this work on ubuntu?
response: This mouse works on all 3 of my computers that run Ubuntu.  The necessary drivers appear to be included in the Ubuntu install disc, as it worked when installing 14.04 on my laptop prior to connecting it to the internet.

context: What does buying instant access get you? like a code for origin?
response: Exactly. The game(on PC) is exclusively for the origin platform. It is a digital purchase either way, but it was cheaper to buy on amazon.

context: Can 1 player play this game?
response: Yes, one player can play this game. You can also "switch" between the basketball players by going to the menu section and scrolling to the Options tab at the top and choose for preferred player none. Hope this helps!

context: Is this a line of sight remote or can the signal go thru a wall?
response: If you mean for the ps3 control then I'd figure within 20ft you'll be good. For the ps3 it works on Bluetooth. All the other things you control it would need a line of sight because it uses IR single not Bluetooth

context: Labeled as COMPLETE ED., but does't have EXT. PACKS & DLC as box describes. What do you recommend?
response: It includes the expansion paks "Gods & Kings" and"Brave New World", which is the latest expansion pak. The DLC, if that's the version you bought, or the registration code, is on the back cover of the manual.  The Manual itself is incomplete, however, the expansion pak manuals are available as an PDF download.

context: what does sony ps3 games mean when they say 3d compatable
response: It means those games with 3d compatable can be played in 3d mode, where u would need the 3d glasses to see it displayed in 3d, but it also has the regular mode which is called 2d. So u should have the option to select 3d or 2d/regular on those types of ps3 games.

context: How do I get my code
response: it is emailed to your amazon email

context: Does it come with l2/r2 buttons because I am trying to play ff8
response: It only comes with 1 pair of triger and theyre the size of the r2/l2 and semi curved like the xbox triggers

context: Do you need internet to download this game?
response: No, thankfully this game was made by people who understand how to distribute games.It comes as a CD but it will install #3 and you will have to choose to play in the #1 or #2 story lines.

context: Are these capable of using USB for a PC hookup or are they the green/pink cables?
response: They are pretty much made for PC so yes.

context: Does this game support English (Menu)?
response: It really doesn't, it will only show on the right of each selection whether it's online or offline mode, but you can google it. I've played it without knowing what it says, just mess with it to give you and idea of what each selection does.

context: I own the 360 version; is there any new material on the Xbox One version, or is it pretty the same except for improved graphics? Thanks!
response: It's pretty the same except for improved graphics

context: can u play offline?
response: Yes, you can play this game offline.

context: can you vary the number of laps in a race or does the game force you into 400 or 500 miles?
response: I can do one race then it freezes even when I splitscreen it freezes I cant race on vertain tracks either

context: can you hear your own voice with this headset?
response: No I don't think any of them do that, it would be distracting.

context: Does the stick have a input for pressing in?
response: On yes it does

context: Will this work on a Windows PC or not?
response: I have windows 7 and it works perfectly with my computer

context: Are the voices in english
response: Yes, and u can put subtitles if u want.

context: Hello, I ordered this game and when i tried registering for my playonline account it said the Registration code was invalid/used.
response: That is just the addd-on. You needed to get the original game that included the expansions. Now you have to buy disc with original game.

context: I'm sure this is dumb question but, does the mouse change colors?
response: You can change its color, however, it will merely 'pulse' with the color you select, not cycle or change.

context: Will this run on W7 (64 bit)?
response: Yes, It worked on my Dell XPS

context: Is it possible to turn off the demon head?
response: I haven't tried. Very evil if you ask me. I know you can fast forward through the speeches if you press and hold the stylus to the bottom screen when he is speaking.

context: Will this game work on a windows 7 laptop?
response: I have a Windows 7 laptop and it works :]
